title: Will Chennai realty ride on metro's success?
text:
Jul 15, 2015, 06.59 PM IST | Source: CNBC-TV18 Will Chennai realty ride on metro's success? Chennai's metro line is only 14 days old and experts are already predicting a 15 percent price appreciation. Like this story, share it with millions of investors on M3 Will Chennai realty ride on metros success? Chennai's metro line is only 14 days old and experts are already predicting a 15 percent price appreciation. Post your opinion here 
C hennai's metro line is only 14 days old and experts are already predicting a 15 percent price appreciation. A recent study suggests that the metro rail turning operational could result in an additional price-rise in realty sector in this city. 
Watch accompanying video for more.
